attributes.action: stop MPs being given a 35000 tax free bung when leaving office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These cheating thieves should not be paid a whopping 35'000 to piss off out of parliament - they should be put in prison.All of them despite specious whining about obeying  the rules !

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
